description: Enabled personalized content recommendation for 6 Million website users annually, using predictive model that recommends industry banner tab and product use-cases on Autodesk Home-Page by analyzing user’s prior click-stream behavior
Spearheading the development of a recommender engine to match customer’s use-case, expressed in natural language, to the appropriate products
Trained and deployed ML model that drives Autodesk Virtual Agent (AVA); the model uses distilBERT to classify natural language queries into relevant customer support functions

Reduced error-rate of estimating product-support case resolution times from 3+ days to 1 hr, by building a distributed data pipeline with Spark that runs an estimation algorithm over teraBytes of data
Automated radiological report summary generation using Attention based Seq2Seq modelling
Segmented inbound patients requiring urgent care vs further screening using clustering and topic modeling on radiological reports
